about_the_game:
Steal It

Steal It is an online multiplayer game 🎮 where it depends on who has the most coins 🪙 at the end of a round.

Coins can either be obtained as rewards by completing tasks ✅ or by stealing them from other players 🕵️‍♂️.

The game has two game modes: a team mode 🤝 and a free-for-all mode 💥.

In team mode, there are two teams. One team tries to get coins by completing tasks 🧩 while the other tries to steal them undetected 😈.

The players have the opportunity to track down thieves 🧐 and lock them up in prison 🚔.

In the free-for-all mode, everyone is on their own 🏃‍♂️. At certain time intervals ⏳, the abilities you can use will change 🔄. You can either steal 🕶️ or perform tasks 🛠️.

Shadow-Heist

Shadow-Heist is a team-based mode where two sides face off—Owners and Thieves.Owners must complete tasks around the map to collect coins 💰, while the Thieves blend in with the crowd, trying to steal without getting caught. 🕵️‍♂️🔓

Each team has 3 unique abilities to give them an edge. Owners can use abilities to move faster or place decoy bodies, while Thieves have tools to remain undetected, like a signal jammer or an ability to temporarily disable another player. 🎯🔧

If Owners suspect someone is a Thief, they can call for a vote to send players to jail. 🚨 But they need to be careful—they only have a limited number of votes! Shadow-Heist is a thrilling mix of strategy, deception, and deduction, where every decision counts. 🧠🎭

All-Steal

All Steal is a chaotic and fast-paced mode where it’s every player for themselves! 🏃‍♂️💨 In this free-for-all mode, your goal is to collect as many coins as possible while outsmarting your opponents.

The twist? Players must complete tasks scattered around the map to earn coins, but they can also steal from others 🕵️‍♀️🔓. Timing is everything—knowing when to complete objectives and when to strike is key to dominating the game.

As the match progresses, the action ramps up, and the stakes get higher. Whether you’re sneaking around or pulling off risky heists, All Steal keeps you on your toes with unpredictable and dynamic gameplay! 💥
